idea:
Multiplexer solution PVT ltd was formed to resolve the problem in the parking domain by processing parkadda technology.

Parkadda is trademark technology of multiplexer solution pvt ltd.

Parkadda is a digital platform for citizens for booking and reserving a parking spot in cities on the go. 

Customers can utilize our other value-added services like buying and recharging fastag, checking the latest fuel pricing, traffic fines.

Customers not only can search for nearby parking, but they can also search for nearby ATMs, toilets, hospitals etc.

Parkadda also provides a platform for the parking site owner to list their parking site on our platform so that customers can pre-book the parking slot on their parking site.

Other than parking listing parking owner can buy hardware, manage his staff and trace every transaction and vehicle in/outflow.

With the help of parkadda government bodies, private organizations can check the real-time count of vehicles incoming and outgoing flow on their space.
name: MULTIPLEXER SOLUTION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Spry Therapeutics Private Limited is building a Digital Health Platform that aims to make Movement Health accessible and affordable to all. Unlike Diabetes or Blood pressure where people have a reference range to understand if they have a health issue in the Movement Health space, there is complete lack of awareness amongst people as to whether they need therapy and when. It is only when people find it difficult to do daily tasks or have pain that they visit a physical therapist or orthopedic. In addition to this lack of awareness amongst people, shortage of skilled supply of caregivers and disjointed and or isolated user experiences are some of the major issues in this industry today.

In a nut shell there is no end to end digital tool which helps patients and caregivers manage the end to end lifecycle of the patient. In India, most records are saved on paper while in the US, care givers have to use 2-3 software solutions to maintain patient records, assign exercises and manage clinical functions. This results in poor patient experience and lack of adherence and visibility into how the treatment is progressing. Spry aims to facilitate value based interactions between patients and caregivers.
name: SPRY THERAPEUTICS PRIVATE LIMITED
